articles.title: WHO approves Hyderabad firm's new oral polio vaccine for immunisation - India Today
articles.description: The World Health Organisation has approved a new Oral Polio Vaccine type 2 nOPV2 from Hyderabad-based Biological E Limited marking a significant step in the fight against polio
articles.content:
The World Health Organisation (WHO) has approved a new Oral Polio Vaccine type 2 (nOPV2) made by Hyderabad-based company Biological E. Limited.
